local_intent: Execute pick using precomputed bread_grasp, lift slightly, and verify stable grasp of bread.
assumptions: bread_grasp has been computed and is valid

coherence_with_global: Aligns with global sequence at the Pick step: uses bread_grasp, performs the pick, lifts along z, and verifies grasp before proceeding to transfer to the plate.
